en: No, he was being stupid. Potter wasn't such an unusual name. He was sure there were lots of people called Potter who had a son called Harry. Come to think of it, he wasn't even sure his nephew was called Harry. He'd never even seen the boy. It might have been Harvey. Or Harold. There was no point in worrying Mrs. Dursley. She always got so upset at any mention of her sister. He didn't blame her if he'd had a sister like that. But all the same, those people in cloaks...
zh: 不，他太愚蠢了。波特并不是⼀个稀有的姓，肯定有许多⼈姓波特，⽽且有⼉⼦叫哈利。想到这⾥，他甚⾄连⾃⼰的外甥是不是哈利·波特都拿不定了。他甚⾄没有⻅过这孩⼦。说不定叫哈维，或者叫哈罗德。没有必要让太太烦⼼，只要⼀提起她妹妹，她总是⼼烦意乱。他并不责怪她，要是他⾃⼰有⼀个那样的妹妹呢？可不管怎么说，这群披⽃篷的⼈……
